input: Tsi ní:ioht ne wa’kè:ron. Wa’kè:ron ne onénhste tsi niwahsen ò:ia. Enkerihwaké:non tsi ní:ioht.
target: Wa’kè:ron ne onénhste. It is a well-made necklace.

input: Ionkwanonhwarí:io ken? Ó:nen kíken kahwatsirà:ken, ionkwanonhwarí:io tsi ní:ioht ne ratirihonnien’táhkhwa.
target: This car is good because it teaches us language.

input: Onkwehón:we tsi ní:ioht ne ionten’nikonhrèn:ton. Ó:nen onkwehón:we tsi ní:ioht, iah teionkwate’nikonhrèn:ton.
target: Indigenous knowledge needs to be respected and preserved.
